com.navis.framework.persistence

Class InterceptionDepthLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.persistence.InterceptionDepthLimiter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterceptionListener

    public final class InterceptionDepthLimiter
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterceptionListener
    CAR-5377 and ARGO-49183 require, that we enable interception of the Hibenate Session even within a current interception. Specifically due to bad Groovy code, this can potentially end up in endless interception (recursion) resulting in OutOfMemoryError or StackOverflowError. This class manages interception depth of BaseInterceptor. It prevents endless recursion by cutting of interception at a certain level; this is done by method getNextSessionInterceptor(), which is supposed to return an instance of an interceptor class, that cannot cause further interception anymore SqlPerformanceInterceptor.
